Title: Relates to funds for innovation grants for programs to create public/private partnerships to develop and implement innovative, technology-based learning strategies
Summary: Relates to funds for innovation grants for programs to create public/private partnerships to develop and implement innovative, technology-based learning strategies to serve high-need pupils and pupils who are at risk of not meeting the New York state learning standards.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the fund for innovation grants
